verses.verse: וַתִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> wat·tiś·śā lifted me up אֹתִ֜י <WH853> ’ō·ṯî - ( Evil in High Places) ר֗וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ Then the Spirit וַתָּבֵ֣א <WH935> wat·tā·ḇê and brought אֹ֠תִי <WH853> ’ō·ṯî me אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> ša·‘ar the gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> bêṯ- of the house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD הַקַּדְמוֹנִי֙ <WH6931> haq·qaḏ·mō·w·nî - הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> hap·pō·w·neh that faces קָדִ֔ימָה <WH6921> qā·ḏî·māh east. וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> wə·hin·nêh And there בְּפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> bə·p̄e·ṯaḥ at the entrance הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> haš·ša·‘ar of the gate עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> ‘eś·rîm [were] twenty-five וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> wa·ḥă·miš·šāh ... אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> ’îš men. וָאֶרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> wā·’er·’eh I saw בְתוֹכָ֜ם <WH8432> ḇə·ṯō·w·ḵām Among אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- them יַאֲזַנְיָ֧ה <WH2970> ya·’ă·zan·yāh Jaazaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son עַזֻּ֛ר <WH5809> ‘az·zur of Azzur וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - פְּלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> pə·laṭ·yā·hū and Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <WH1141> bə·nā·yā·hū of Benaiah, שָׂרֵ֖י <WH8269> śā·rê who were leaders הָעָֽם׃פ <WH5971> hā·‘ām of the people.

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer And [the LORD] said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> ’ê·lāy to me, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- “ Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man, אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh these הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <WH582> hā·’ă·nā·šîm are the men הַחֹשְׁבִ֥ים <WH2803> ha·ḥō·šə·ḇîm who plot אָ֛וֶן <WH205> ’ā·wen evil וְהַיֹּעֲצִ֥ים <WH3289> wə·hay·yō·‘ă·ṣîm and give עֲצַת־ <WH6098> ‘ă·ṣaṯ- counsel רָ֖ע <WH7451> rā‘ wicked בָּעִ֥יר <WH5892> bā·‘îr city. הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> haz·zōṯ in this

הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH559> hā·’ō·mə·rîm They are saying, לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō ‘ Is not בְקָר֖וֹב <WH7138> ḇə·qā·rō·wḇ the time near בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1129> bə·nō·wṯ to build בָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> bāt·tîm houses? הִ֣יא <WH1931> hî The city הַסִּ֔יר <WH5518> has·sîr [is] the cooking pot, ( Or cauldron) וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> wa·’ă·naḥ·nū and we הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> hab·bā·śār are the meat. ’

לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> lā·ḵên Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin·nā·ḇê prophesy עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·hem against them; הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin·nā·ḇê prophesy, בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- O son אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man! ”

וַתִּפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> wat·tip·pōl fell עָלַי֮ <WH5921> ‘ā·lay upon me ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ And the Spirit יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and told אֵלַ֗י <WH413> ’ê·lay me אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> ’ĕ·mōr to declare כֹּה־ <WH3541> kōh- that this is what אָמַ֣ר <WH559> ’ā·mar says: יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> kên “ That is what אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH559> ’ă·mar·tem you are thinking, בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel; וּמַעֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ū·ma·‘ă·lō·wṯ the thoughts רֽוּחֲכֶ֖ם <WH7307> rū·ḥă·ḵem that arise in your minds. אֲנִ֥י <WH589> ’ă·nî and I יְדַעְתִּֽיהָ׃ <WH3045> yə·ḏa‘·tî·hā know

הִרְבֵּיתֶ֥ם <WH7235> hir·bê·ṯem You have multiplied חַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH2491> ḥal·lê·ḵem those you killed בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> bā·‘îr city הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ in this וּמִלֵּאתֶ֥ם <WH4390> ū·mil·lê·ṯem and filled חוּצֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH2351> ḥū·ṣō·ṯe·hā its streets חָלָֽל׃פ <WH2491> ḥā·lāl with the dead.

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> lā·ḵên Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> kōh- this is what אָמַר֮ <WH559> ’ā·mar says: אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD חַלְלֵיכֶם֙ <WH2491> ḥal·lê·ḵem The slain אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - שַׂמְתֶּ֣ם <WH7760> śam·tem you have laid בְּתוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> bə·ṯō·w·ḵāh within הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> hêm·māh [this city] הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> hab·bā·śār are the meat, וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> wə·hî and the city הַסִּ֑יר <WH5518> has·sîr is the pot; וְאֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> wə·’eṯ·ḵem - הוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> hō·w·ṣî but I will remove you מִתּוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> mit·tō·w·ḵāh from it.

חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ḥe·reḇ the sword, יְרֵאתֶ֑ם <WH3372> yə·rê·ṯem You fear וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> wə·ḥe·reḇ the sword אָבִ֣יא <WH935> ’ā·ḇî so I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·ḵem against you, נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> nə·’um declares אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD.

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> wə·hō·w·ṣê·ṯî I will bring you אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem - מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <WH8432> mit·tō·w·ḵāh out of [the city] וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> wə·nā·ṯat·tî and deliver אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem you בְּיַד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- into the hands זָרִ֑ים <WH2114> zā·rîm of foreigners, וְעָשִׂ֛יתִי <WH6213> wə·‘ā·śî·ṯî and I will execute בָכֶ֖ם Prep│2mp ( ḇā·ḵem) against you. שְׁפָטִֽים׃ 8201 N-mp ( šə·p̄ā·ṭîm) judgments

בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ba·ḥe·reḇ by the sword, תִּפֹּ֔לוּ <WH5307> tip·pō·lū You will fall עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- even גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> gə·ḇūl to the borders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel. אֶשְׁפּ֣וֹט <WH8199> ’eš·pō·wṭ and I will judge אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> ’eṯ·ḵem you וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> wî·ḏa‘·tem Then you will know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> ’ă·nî I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh am the LORD.

הִ֗יא <WH1931> hî The city לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- will not תִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> ṯih·yeh be לָכֶם֙ Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) for you, לְסִ֔יר 5518 Prep-l│N-cs ( lə·sîr) a pot וְאַתֶּ֛ם 859 Conj-w│Pro-2mp ( wə·’at·tem) nor will you תִּהְי֥וּ 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( tih·yū) be בְתוֹכָ֖הּ 8432 Prep-b│N-msc│3fs ( ḇə·ṯō·w·ḵāh) within it. לְבָשָׂ֑ר 1320 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·ḇā·śār) the meat אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) even to גְּב֥וּל 1366 N-msc ( gə·ḇūl) the borders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) of Israel. אֶשְׁפֹּ֥ט 8199 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’eš·pōṭ) I will judge אֶתְכֶֽם׃ 853 DirObjM│2mp ( ’eṯ·ḵem) you

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> wî·ḏa‘·tem Then you will know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> ’ă·nî I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh am the LORD. אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer For בְּחֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> bə·ḥuq·qay My statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō you have neither הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> hă·laḵ·tem followed וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> ū·miš·pā·ṭay My ordinances, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> ‘ă·śî·ṯem practiced וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <WH4941> ū·ḵə·miš·pə·ṭê to the ordinances הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> hag·gō·w·yim of the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5439> sə·ḇî·ḇō·w·ṯê·ḵem around you. ” עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> ‘ă·śî·ṯem but you have conformed

( A Promise of Restoration) ( 300 32:36-44 ) וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî Now as I was כְּהִנָּ֣בְאִ֔י <WH5012> kə·hin·nā·ḇə·’î prophesying, וּפְלַטְיָ֥הוּ <WH6410> ū·p̄ə·laṭ·yā·hū Pelatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ḇen- son בְּנָיָ֖ה <WH1141> bə·nā·yāh of Benaiah מֵ֑ת <WH4191> mêṯ died. וָאֶפֹּ֨ל <WH5307> wā·’ep·pōl Then I fell עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- facedown פָּנַ֜י <WH6440> pā·nay ... וָאֶזְעַ֣ק <WH2199> wā·’ez·‘aq and cried out קוֹל־ <WH6963> qō·wl- voice, גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> gā·ḏō·wl in a loud וָאֹמַר֙ <WH559> wā·’ō·mar ... אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> ’ă·hāh “ Oh, אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD, כָּלָה֙ <WH3617> kā·lāh to a complete end? ” אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ’at·tāh will You עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ‘ō·śeh bring אֵ֖ת <WH854> ’êṯ ... שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> šə·’ê·rîṯ the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃פ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî came דְבַר־ <WH1697> ḏə·ḇar- Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> ’ê·lay to me, לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr saying,

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- “ Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man, אַחֶ֤יךָ <WH251> ’a·ḥe·ḵā your brothers — אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> ’a·ḥe·ḵā your relatives, אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> ’an·šê your fellow exiles גְאֻלָּתֶ֔ךָ <WH1353> ḡə·’ul·lā·ṯe·ḵā ..., וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> bêṯ house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> kul·lōh - — אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ’ă·šer are those of whom אָמְר֨וּ <WH559> ’ā·mə·rū have said, לָהֶ֜ם Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) יֹשְׁבֵ֣י 3427 V-Qal-Prtcpl-mpc ( yō·šə·ḇê) the people יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם 3389 N-proper-fs ( yə·rū·šā·lim) of Jerusalem רַֽחֲקוּ֙ 7368 V-Qal-Imp-mp ( ra·ḥă·qū) ‘ They are far away מֵעַ֣ל 5921 Prep-m ( mê·‘al) from יְהוָ֔ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD; לָ֥נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) to us הִ֛יא 1931 Pro-3fs ( hî) this נִתְּנָ֥ה 5414 V-Nifal-Perf-3fs ( nit·tə·nāh) has been given הָאָ֖רֶץ 776 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ā·reṣ) land לְמוֹרָשָֽׁה׃ס 4181 Prep-l│N-fs ( lə·mō·w·rā·šāh) as a possession. ’

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> lā·ḵên Therefore אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> ’ĕ·mōr declare כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> kōh- that this is what אָמַר֮ <WH559> ’ā·mar says: אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> Yah·weh GOD כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî ‘ Although הִרְחַקְתִּים֙ <WH7368> hir·ḥaq·tîm I sent them far away בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag·gō·w·yim among the nations וְכִ֥י <WH3588> wə·ḵî ... הֲפִֽיצוֹתִ֖ים <WH6327> hă·p̄î·ṣō·w·ṯîm and scattered them בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> bā·’ă·rā·ṣō·wṯ among the countries, וָאֱהִ֤י <WH1961> wā·’ĕ·hî I have been לָהֶם֙ Prep│3mp ( lā·hem) for them לְמִקְדָּ֣שׁ 4720 Prep-l│N-ms ( lə·miq·dāš) a sanctuary מְעַ֔ט 4592 Adj-ms ( mə·‘aṭ) yet for a little while בָּאֲרָצ֖וֹת 776 Prep-b, Art│N-fp ( bā·’ă·rā·ṣō·wṯ) in the countries אֲשֶׁר־ 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer-) to which בָּ֥אוּ 935 V-Qal-Perf-3cp ( bā·’ū) they have gone שָֽׁם׃ס 8033 Adv ( šām) .... ’
